from django.urls import path
from . import views

urlpatterns = [
    path('', views.home_view, name='home'),
    path('exchange-rates/', views.exchange_rates_view, name='exchange_rates'),
    path('historical-data/', views.historical_data_view, name='historical_data'),
    path('settings/', views.settings_view, name='settings'),
]

from django.db import models

# Models to store currency conversion data, exchange rates, and settings can go here

class Currency(models.Model):
    code = models.CharField(max_length=3)
    name = models.CharField(max_length=50)

class ExchangeRate(models.Model):
    base_currency = models.ForeignKey(Currency, related_name='base', on_delete=models.CASCADE)
    target_currency = models.ForeignKey(Currency, related_name='target', on_delete=models.CASCADE)
    rate = models.DecimalField(max_digits=10, decimal_places=4)
    date = models.DateField()

from django import forms

class CurrencyConversionForm(forms.Form):
    base_currency = forms.CharField(max_length=3)
    target_currency = forms.CharField(max_length=3)
    amount = forms.DecimalField()

class DateRangeForm(forms.Form):
    start_date = forms.DateField()
    end_date = forms.DateField()

from django.contrib import admin
from .models import Currency, ExchangeRate

admin.site.register(Currency)
admin.site.register(ExchangeRate)

Read About Us

<form>
    <label for='length'>Password Length:</label>
    <input type='number' id='length' name='length'>
    <label for='chars'>Character Types:</label>
    <select id='chars' name='chars'>
        <option value='uppercase'>Uppercase</option>
        <option value='lowercase'>Lowercase</option>
        <option value='numbers'>Numbers</option>
        <option value='symbols'>Symbols</option>
    </select>
    <button type='submit'>Generate Password</button>
    <button type='button' onclick='copyPassword()'>Copy Password</button>
</form>
<script>
function copyPassword() {
    // JavaScript to copy password
}
</script>

from django.db import models

class QRCodeHistory(models.Model):
    text = models.CharField(max_length=255)
    qr_code_image = models.ImageField(upload_to='qr_codes/')
    created_at = models.DateTimeField(auto_now_add=True)

class PricingPlan(models.Model):
    name = models.CharField(max_length=100)
    description = models.TextField()
    price = models.DecimalField(max_digits=10, decimal_places=2, null=True, blank=True)
    is_free = models.BooleanField(default=False)

from django.urls import path
from . import views

urlpatterns = [
    path('', views.home_view, name='home'),
    path('about/', views.about_view, name='about'),
    path('pricing/', views.pricing_view, name='pricing'),
    path('contact/', views.contact_view, name='contact'),
]

from django.contrib import admin
from .models import QRCodeHistory, PricingPlan

admin.site.register(QRCodeHistory)
admin.site.register(PricingPlan)

from django.apps import AppConfig

class QrAppConfig(AppConfig):
    default_auto_field = 'django.db.models.BigAutoField'
    name = 'qr_app'

from django import forms

class ContactForm(forms.Form):
    name = forms.CharField(max_length=100)
    email = forms.EmailField()
    message = forms.CharField(widget=forms.Textarea)

from django.urls import path
from . import views

urlpatterns = [
    path('', views.home, name='home'),
    path('dashboard/', views.dashboard, name='dashboard'),
    path('analysis/', views.analysis, name='analysis'),
    path('settings/', views.settings, name='settings'),
]

from django.db import models

class User(models.Model):
    username = models.CharField(max_length=100)
    email = models.EmailField()
    password = models.CharField(max_length=100)

class FoodEntry(models.Model):
    user = models.ForeignKey(User, on_delete=models.CASCADE)
    food_item = models.CharField(max_length=100)
    calories = models.IntegerField()
    date = models.DateField(auto_now_add=True)

from django.contrib import admin
from .models import User, FoodEntry

admin.site.register(User)
admin.site.register(FoodEntry)

13.code:
from django.db import models

class Customer(models.Model):
    name = models.CharField(max_length=255)
    birthday = models.DateField()
    age = models.IntegerField()
    sex = models.CharField(max_length=10)
    company = models.CharField(max_length=255)
    phone_number = models.CharField(max_length=20)

class Product(models.Model):
    name = models.CharField(max_length=255)
    category = models.CharField(max_length=255)
    recommended_price = models.DecimalField(max_digits=10, decimal_places=2)

class PurchaseRecord(models.Model):
    datetime = models.DateTimeField()
    product = models.ForeignKey(Product, on_delete=models.CASCADE)
    customer = models.ForeignKey(Customer, on_delete=models.CASCADE)
    quantity = models.IntegerField()
    amount = models.DecimalField(max_digits=10, decimal_places=2)

from django.urls import path
from . import views

urlpatterns = [
    # Customer Management
    path('customers/add/', views.CustomerView.add_customer, name='add_customer'),
    path('customers/', views.CustomerView.view_customer_list, name='view_customer_list'),
    path('customers/edit/<int:customer_id>/', views.CustomerView.edit_customer, name='edit_customer'),
    path('customers/delete/<int:customer_id>/', views.CustomerView.delete_customer, name='delete_customer'),
    path('customers/assign-products/<int:customer_id>/', views.CustomerView.assign_preferred_products, name='assign_preferred_products'),

    # Product Management
    path('products/add/', views.ProductView.add_product, name='add_product'),
    path('products/', views.ProductView.view_product_list, name='view_product_list'),
    path('products/edit/<int:product_id>/', views.ProductView.edit_product, name='edit_product'),
    path('products/delete/<int:product_id>/', views.ProductView.delete_product, name='delete_product'),

    # Purchase Records
    path('purchases/add/', views.PurchaseRecordView.add_purchase_record, name='add_purchase_record'),
    path('purchases/', views.PurchaseRecordView.view_purchase_records, name='view_purchase_records'),
    path('purchases/edit/<int:record_id>/', views.PurchaseRecordView.edit_purchase_record, name='edit_purchase_record'),
    path('purchases/delete/<int:record_id>/', views.PurchaseRecordView.delete_purchase_record, name='delete_purchase_record'),

    # Sales Analysis
    path('sales/summary/', views.SalesAnalysisView.view_sales_summary, name='view_sales_summary'),
    path('sales/report/', views.SalesAnalysisView.generate_sales_report, name='generate_sales_report'),
    path('sales/popularity/', views.SalesAnalysisView.product_popularity_analysis, name='product_popularity_analysis'),
    path('sales/trends/', views.SalesAnalysisView.customer_purchase_trends, name='customer_purchase_trends'),
]

from django.contrib import admin
from .models import Customer, Product, PurchaseRecord

admin.site.register(Customer)
admin.site.register(Product)
admin.site.register(PurchaseRecord)

from django.db import models

class Category(models.Model):
    name = models.CharField(max_length=255)

class Post(models.Model):
    title = models.CharField(max_length=255)
    content = models.TextField()
    category = models.ForeignKey(Category, on_delete=models.CASCADE)
    created_at = models.DateTimeField(auto_now_add=True)

from django.urls import path
from . import views

urlpatterns = [
    path('', views.home, name='home'),
    path('search/', views.search_posts, name='search_posts'),

    path('post/<int:post_id>/', views.blog_post, name='blog_post'),
    path('about/', views.about, name='about'),
    path('contact/', views.contact, name='contact'),
]
